Class: SimpleWhiteEraser

DrawerJs.plugins. SimpleWhiteEraser

new SimpleWhiteEraser(drawerInstance, options)

Provides a a simple eraser button which activates free drawing mode and makes a brush with white color.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawerInstance DrawerJs.Drawer Instance of DrawerJs.Drawer.
options Object Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Description
brushSize number Eraser default brush size
cursorUrl String Custom CSS url for eraser cursor. Example: 
url(path/to/cursor.cur), default
 Note the word 'default' at the end: that is the name of cursor that will be used when url is unavailable. More information about css cursor property could be found here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/cursor
Source:
  • plugins/brush-eraser-simplewhite/SimpleWhiteEraser.js, line 33
See:
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/cursor

Extends

  • DrawerJs.plugins.BaseBrush

Members

previousBrushSize :Number

BrushSize before eraser tool. Used to separate eraser brush size from other brushes.
Type:
  • Number
Source:
  • plugins/brush-eraser-simplewhite/SimpleWhiteEraser.js, line 70

previousColor :String

Color value before eraser tool.
Type:
  • String
Source:
  • plugins/brush-eraser-simplewhite/SimpleWhiteEraser.js, line 63

savedBrushSize :Number

Last used eraser brush size. Used to restore eraser size after another brush tool.
Type:
  • Number
